# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

message(STATUS "Setting up module " kinematics)

FILE(GLOB gensources
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/kinematics/*.cpp")

FILE(GLOB genheaders
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/include/IMP/kinematics/*.h")

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})
add_definitions("-DIMPKINEMATICS_EXPORTS")

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${KINEMATICS_CXX_FLAGS}")

set(headers ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/CompositeJoint.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/DOF.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/DOFValues.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/DOFsSampler.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/Joint.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/KinematicForest.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/KinematicForestScoreState.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/KinematicNode.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/PrismaticJoint.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/ProteinKinematics.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/RRT.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/TransformationJoint.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/UniformBackboneSampler.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/directional_DOFs.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/local_planners.h
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/include/revolute_joints.h)

if(DEFINED IMP_KINEMATICS_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES)
  set_source_files_properties(${IMP_KINEMATICS_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
                              PROPERTIES GENERATED 1)
endif()

if(DEFINED IMP_kinematics_IS_PER_CPP)
  set(sources ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/CompositeJoint.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/DOF.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/Joint.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/KinematicForest.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/KinematicForestScoreState.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/KinematicNode.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/PrismaticJoint.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/ProteinKinematics.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/RRT.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/TransformationJoint.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/UniformBackboneSampler.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/local_planners.cpp
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/kinematics/src/revolute_joints.cpp)

  add_library(imp_kinematics ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${sources}
              ${IMP_KINEMATICS_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )
else()

  add_library(imp_kinematics ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/kinematics_all.cpp
              ${IMP_KINEMATICS_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )

endif()
INSTALL(TARGETS imp_kinematics DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR})

if(DEFINED IMP_KINEMATICS_LIBRARY_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES)
  add_dependencies(imp_kinematics ${IMP_KINEMATICS_LIBRARY_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES})
endif()

target_link_libraries(imp_kinematics
                      ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
                      ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES}
  )

set(IMP_KINEMATICS_LIBRARY imp_kinematics CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
